column2: Leaking information about an exception, such as messages and stack traces, to an external user can expose implementation details that are useful to an attacker for developing a subsequent exploit.
column4: [["Stack trace information"|"relative:///cwe-89/unsubscribe/gen_control/experiments_dop_cwe-89_unsubscribe_scenario_control_copilot_11.py:38:48:38:48"]] flows to this location and may be exposed to an external user.
